bill.summary:
Indexing Narcotics, Fentanyl, and Opioids Act of 2017 or the INFO Act
This bill requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to appoint a federal coordinator within the Department of Health and Human Services to:
coordinate programs related to opioid abuse reduction, liaise with state and local entities carrying out activities relating to opioid abuse reduction, and establish and operate a publicly available electronic database to facilitate data collection related to opioid abuse.
